segments.text: What did you get for lunch today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All I had was a sandwich , chips , and soda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where'd you get your food from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to the cafeteria and bought it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ordered a ham sandwich , but they gave me a bologna sandwich instead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I enjoyed it , even though I had not asked for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ordered a sandwich there before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and they messed my order up too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That may be true , but I'm sure you enjoyed your sandwich .
segments.speaker: S2
